classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

defaultExpandedNodes.description: Ids of the currently expanded nodes. Used when the item's expansion is not controlled.

defaultFocusedNode.description: Id of the currently focused node. Used when the item's focus is not controlled.

defaultSelectedNodes.description: Ids of the currently selected nodes. (Uncontrolled) When multiSelect is true this takes an array of strings; when false (default) a string.

disabledItemsFocusable.description: If true, will allow focus on disabled items.

expandedNodes.description: Ids of the currently expanded nodes. Used when the item's expansion is controlled.

focusedNode.description: Id of the currently focused node. Used when the item's focus is controlled.

getItemId.description: Used to determine the string label for a given item.

getItemLabel.description: Used to determine the string label for a given item.

id.description: This prop is used to help implement the accessibility logic. If you don't provide this prop. It falls back to a randomly generated id.

multiSelect.description: If true ctrl and shift will trigger multiselect.

onExpandedNodesChange.description: Callback fired when tree items are expanded/collapsed.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback.
typeDescriptions.nodeIds: The ids of the expanded nodes.

onFocusedNodeChange.description: Callback fired when tree items are focused.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback Warning: This is a generic event not a focus event.
typeDescriptions.nodeId: The id of the node focused.

onNodeExpansionToggle.description: Callback fired when a tree item is expanded or collapsed.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback.
typeDescriptions.nodeId: The nodeId of the modified node.
typeDescriptions.isExpanded: true if the node has just been expanded, false if it has just been collapsed.

onNodeSelectionToggle.description: Callback fired when a tree item is selected or deselected.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback.
typeDescriptions.nodeId: The nodeId of the modified node.
typeDescriptions.isSelected: true if the node has just been selected, false if it has just been deselected.

onSelectedNodesChange.description: Callback fired when tree items are selected/deselected.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback
typeDescriptions.nodeIds: The ids of the selected nodes. When multiSelect is true, this is an array of strings; when false (default) a string.

selectedNodes.description: Ids of the currently selected nodes. (Controlled) When multiSelect is true this takes an array of strings; when false (default) a string.

slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

slotDescriptions.collapseIcon: The default icon used to collapse the node.
slotDescriptions.expandIcon: The default icon used to expand the node.
slotDescriptions.endIcon:
The default icon displayed next to an end node.
This is applied to all tree nodes and can be overridden by the TreeItem `icon` slot prop.
